articles.title: Two IPOs to enter market this week, subscriptions allowed only on BSE. Check details | Mint - Mint
articles.description: As per BSE data, a total of 34 IPOs have debuted on the stock exchange's SME platform so far in 2022. This year, the demand to list on the SME platform has been robust compared to 27 listings on this BSE medium in 2021.
